1: -module(sock_worker_SUITE).
    2: -export([all/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,suite/0]).
    3: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
    4: 
    5: 
    6: suite()->
    7:     [{port,8300}].
    8: init_per_suite(Config)->
    9:     Config.
   10: 
   11: end_per_suite(Config)->
   12:     ok.
   13: 
   14: init_per_testcase(Case,Config)->
   15:     application:start(sockapp),
   16:     Config.
   17: end_per_testcase(Case,Config)->
   18:     application:stop(sockapp),
   19:     ok.
   20: 
   21: run_worker(Port)->
   22:     {ok,Socket}=gen_tcp:listen(Port, []),
   23:     {ok,Pid}=sock_worker:start_link(Socket,3),
   24:     [{socket,Socket},{pid,Pid}].
   25: 
   26: 
   27: all()->
   28:     [
   29:         can_receive_state,
   30:         can_enter_tcp_clause
   31:     ].
   32: 
   33: can_receive_state()->
   34:     Message=state,
   35:     Pid=sock_worker_test:run_worker(),
   36:     ?assert({state,[],[],[],[]}=:=gen_server:call(Pid,Message)).
   37: 
   38: can_enter_tcp_clause()->
   39:     Message=state,
   40:     Pid=sock_worker_test:run_worker(),
   41:     ?assert({state,[],[],[],[]}=:=gen_server:call(Pid,Message)),
   42:     NewMessage=count,
   43:     Pid ! {tcp,ign,NewMessage},
   44:     ?assertMatch(1,receive Msg->binary_to_term(Msg) end),
   45:     ?assert({state,[count],[],[],[]}=:=gen_server:call(Pid,Message)).
   46: 
   47:
